title: Unstable High Ping
body: I've been playing LoL for 2 1/2 years now and just recently in the past like 3 or 4 months my ping has been very unstable. It used to be and is still occasionally 32-28 ping stable. But now, about 90% of the time, my ping jumps randomly between 60-220 ping. This is causing my game to perform worse and I've tried many things to try and fix it. I close out of everything when I play league, so that it is the only thing open (not even the client is open, i turned that off). It is not my router because i have restarted it and came back to league with the same issue.

replies.body: It sounds like you might be experiencing packet loss in your game, something specifically degrading your connection while in-game.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of your specific case.  Let me know what you find!
